text: Peace on Earth, War on Stage is a 7" vinyl E.P. released by Philadelphia hardcore band Blacklisted on Deathwish Inc.. It is available on multiple colors and has a total press of 3,000 to date. ==Track listing== #"Ivory Tower" – 1:20 #"Memory Layne" – 1:43 #"Canonized" – 1:28 #"Setting Sun" – 1:26 ==References== Category:2007 albums Category:Deathwish Inc. EPs Category:Blacklisted (band) albums Category:Albums with cover art by Jacob Bannon
title: Peace on Earth, War on Stage
